comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: I love this!  Everyone's expressions, especially the little girl's, are fantastic.

comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: An explosion and fire at the Cincinnati coal mine, located near Finleyville, Pennsylvania, resulted in the deaths of 97 miners and one member of a rescue crew. The disaster occurred on April 23, 1913. Web page with a lot of typos and a drawing made from this photo

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: whyaduck:  Thanks for the additional information on this event. We'll update the source data and then reload the description to Flickr.
